channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
help, when i try to compile my compiler says this
javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
Im not sure what to do. People say reroute the java to the compiler or something like that? witch i have no clue on how to do. If you know how to fix please put it in small easy steeps on how to fix. (not the best person that follows tut/s very well.) And i look in the compile area and i couldn't find a place were it would fix my problem. Please help if you can thank you for your time.
